ygData.subject: Re: Lake Rathe question JB?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi! ... Island with 2 aviak spawns have loc around +1000, +1000. Never seen any John Bucker in zone, i have seen only 2 named goblins (aqua goblins?), bunch of
ygData.messageBody:
Hi!

> I seem to remember someone posting about an NPC in Lake Rathe named John
> Buckler or something and he was good to kill from like 16 up to 19th
> then there was another island w/ a double Aviak Guard spawn in that zone
> that not many people went to, but I forget where in the zone it was. Can
> anyone help me on locateing these 2 places in Lake Rathe . .. thanks

Island with 2 aviak spawns have loc around +1000, +1000. Never seen any
John Bucker in zone, i have seen only 2 named goblins (aqua goblins?),
bunch of vendors, 2 guards and alot of regular monsters (aviaks,
bandits, orc, ogres, gnolls, undeads). Maybe he is a vendor or a rare
spawn in one of camps.
